title: Accessibility
description: A summary of a document's accessibility

rating.description: An at-a-glance rating for the document's accessibility

features.description: A list of the accessibility features that a document has or is lacking

text-based.description: The document's text is selectable and searchable

semantics.description: Different types of content within the document have semantic roles, e.g. heading

alt text.description: Media within the document has alternate text
